modName: A realistic size for a maces replacer
summary:
A simple mod. Replaces Vanilla ebony, daedric, dwarven, ebony,elven and glass maces for the same but smaller. Now the mace is comparable in 

scale with the character of any weight.
I made a smaller version of the mace because I like this weapon, but the original version looks unreal. 

The only character that looks fine with the original mace
descriptionHtml:
A realistic size for a mace

A simple mod. Replaces Vanilla daedric, dwarven, ebony, elven and glass maces for the same but smaller. 
Now the club is comparable in scale with the character of any weight.
I made a smaller version of the mace because I like this weapon, but the original version looks unreal. The only character that looks fine with the original mace is Tsun. In my opinion, of course. Try it. Especially if you play a female character.

Especially if you play a female character.

Install:

Any manager or manually.

Files:  meshes\\weapons\\daedric\\1stpersondaedricmace.nif
         meshes\\weapons\\daedric\\daedricmace.nif
         meshes\\weapons\\dwarven\\1stpersondwarvenmace.nif
         meshes\\weapons\\dwarven\\dwarvenmace.nif
         meshes\\weapons\\ebony\\1stpersonebonymace.nif
         meshes\\weapons\\ebony\\ebonymace.nif
         meshes\\weapons\\elven\\1stpersonelvenmace.nif
         meshes\\weapons\\elven\\elvenmace.nif
         meshes\\weapons\\glass\\1stpersonglassmace.nif
         meshes\\weapons\\glass\\glassmace.nif

Uninstall:

Use manager, or delete files: meshes\\weapons\\daedric\\1stpersondaedricmace.nif
		                         meshes\\weapons\\daedric\\daedricmace.nif
		                         meshes\\weapons\\dwarven\\1stpersondwarvenmace.nif
		                         meshes\\weapons\\dwarven\\dwarvenmace.nif
		                         meshes\\weapons\\ebony\\1stpersonebonymace.nif
		                         meshes\\weapons\\ebony\\ebonymace.nif
		                         meshes\\weapons\\elven\\1stpersonelvenmace.nif
		                         meshes\\weapons\\elven\\elvenmace.nif
		                         meshes\\weapons\\glass\\1stpersonglassmace.nif
		                         meshes\\weapons\\glass\\glassmace.nif
Hope you like it!
author: ortog
